name: UISearchBar.Style
desc: Specifies whether the search bar has a background.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The search bar has the default style.

items.name: case prominent
items.desc: The search bar has a translucent background, and the search field is opaque.

items.name: case minimal
items.desc: The search bar has no background, and the search field is translucent.
